_header: Before my death this lay of sorrow I sing
_description: The Lay of Sorrow — 185 lines in twenty-one stanzas, generally of 9 lines each

BodArcSelB24.First Lines:
Befor my deth this lay of sorow I singWith carefull melodye and
                    entunyng…
BodArcSelB24.Last Lines:
…Of him the quhich enheryit hath þe RentOf fair langage
                    to all þe Worldis ere
BodArcSelB24.Facsimiles:
Boffey,  Julia,  and  A. S. G. Edwards, eds.  
             Chaucer, Works. Bodleian Library MS Arch Selden B.24: Facsimile
                Edition.
         Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1995.
BodArcSelB24.Editions:
Wilson,  Kenneth George. 
             “The Lay of Sorrow and The Lufaris Complaynt: An Edition.” 
             Speculum
         29 (1954): 708-26: 716-19.
